notable_dates.event: Started four-year Bachelor of Business Administration program affiliated with University of Santa Clara, California
Officially established as Assumption Business Administration College (ABAC) with Ministry of Education approval
Accredited by Ministry of University Affairs
Granted full university status as Assumption University

origins.philosophy: Open, international community with moral integrity and high ethical standards

historical_notes: Assumption College founded in 1885 by Rev. Father Emile August Colombet
Teaching conducted in English is a hallmark
Faculty and students maintain cultural and religious identity freely
